title: Application of rosin resin and zinc oxide nanocomposites to chitosan coatings for extending the shelf life of passion fruits
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,415-425
DOI: 10.1039/D3FB00189J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jailton Ribeiro dos Santos Junior, Luiz Carlos Corrêa-Filho, Vitória Oliveira Pereira, Henriqueta Talita Guimarães Barboza, José Carlos Sá Ferreira, Antônio Gomes Soares, Renata Valeriano Tonon, Lourdes Maria Corrêa Cabral
The coating containing rosin resin maintained the post-harvest quality of the passion fruit, allowing the passion fruit to reach the 10th day of storage under conditions suitable for consumption.
